cleaned_text: Helping to raise the vibration of the planet. Healing Touch is an energy therapy that uses gentle hand techniques to realign a patient's energy field and aid in the healing of the mind, body, and spirit. It complements other healing techniques including conventional medical practices as well as other mind-body therapies such as massage, acupressure, music and tone therapy. It was developed by a nurse named Janet Mentgen in 1980 and now has more than 90,000 practitioners worldwide. - Silver Plated For A Glossy Finish - 20 Inch Necklace Included - Pendant Is 1 1/8" Diameter - Printed And Shipped From USA - Shipped From Our Warehouse In 2-3 Days
